EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell GoDirect Keeps You Connected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Cabin Connectivity Solution You’ve Been Waiting For.
Honeywell is combining hardware with services in order to deliver a convenient solution for the business aircraft operator. This limited time offer provides the system and services needed to keep you connected, at the lowest price ever offered! The satellite service is supported by Inmarsat and Honeywell's GoDirect Flight Services. The Aspire™ 200 Inmarsat SwiftBroadband Satcom system is Honeywell’s most economical connectivity solution offering high speed data capability. Designed to provide compact, lightweight satellite communications, the Aspire 200’s high level of performance make it a suitable choice for all size aircraft. New for 2017, operators can take advantage of a service package that delivers 425 MB per month at a monthly rate of $2,600.00 for 36 months. Upon completion of the lease period, the hardware can be returned or purchased for $250 USD. *Limited time offer, good through December 31, 2017.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Apsire.html]]>
